name: Leech: Amongst Us
description:
Who is the imposter trying to murder you and the Vampire Prince of Manchester?

It could be one of five Vampires, interview them to discover their secrets and possibly their motives for betrayal.

Each time you play, the imposter is a different character!

Victory is not certain!

Lots of fun ways to die!

One "good" ending?

Controls:

Click to proceed text, click on text options when they appear.

Written and Created by Josh "GamingFTL" Mathews, Code by Lexie Smith, Character Art by Miranda Quesnel, VO by Miranda Quesnel (Jean), BradWOTO (Lionel), Pumpkinberry (Sophia), PeachyPixel8 (Alex) and TuesdayGrey (Ninette).

This game was created as a part of Vampire: The Masquerade game jam. Events portrayed in this game are not canon within World of Darkness universe
